nodes.text: The Sooma system was a star system located in the Thanium sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories that contained the planet Sooma, the homeworld of the sentient Sooman species.

The Sooma system first appeared, albeit unidentified, in Droids 4, the fourth issue of the Star Wars: Droids comic series published by Star Comics, an imprint of Marvel Comics, which was first published on October 1, 1986. It was first identified in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square R-6.
